name: @trz/hooks
description: 一个 React Hooks 工具集
author: ZHENYUAN <JAYNE@CHENZHENYUAN.COM>

scripts.build:cpr: npx cpr package.json release/ && npx cpr LICENSE release/ && npx cpr README.md release/ && npx cpr CHANGELOG.md release/
scripts.build: npm run build:babel && npm run build:tsc
scripts.release:pre: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:cpr
scripts.release: npm run release:pre && cd ./release && npm publish --access=public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org
